Notes.Text:
This update for openvpn fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2025-2704: Fixed remote DoS due to possible ASSERT() on OpenVPN servers using --tls-crypt-v2 (bsc#1240392)

Vulnerabilities.Description: OpenVPN version 2.6.1 through 2.6.13 in server mode using TLS-crypt-v2 allows remote attackers to trigger a denial of service by corrupting and replaying network packets in the early handshake phase
